mapper.select: SELECT rnum, notice_id, notice_title, notice_regdate, notice_hitcount FROM( SELECT rownum as rnum, notice_id, notice_title, notice_regdate, notice_hitcount FROM ( SELECT notice_id, notice_title, notice_regdate, notice_hitcount FROM notice ORDER BY notice_regdate DESC ) WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}
